title: Border, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for red
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 216 x 5 cm (7 ft. 1 1/16 in. x 1 15/16 in.)
Repeat H: 14.5 cm (5 11/16 in.)
description: Long narrow strip of printed fabric used as binding of 1976-30-5A. A small scale leaf pattern in red.
